title: Google\Cloud\Optimization\V1\InjectedSolutionConstraint
name: InjectedSolutionConstraint
description:
Solution injected in the request including information about which visits must be constrained and how they must be constrained.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.optimization.v1.InjectedSolutionConstraint

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.routes
params.description: Routes of the solution to inject. Some routes may be omitted from the original solution. The routes and skipped shipments must satisfy the basic validity assumptions listed for injected_first_solution_routes.

params.name: data.skipped_shipments
params.description: Skipped shipments of the solution to inject. Some may be omitted from the original solution. See the routes field.

params.name: data.constraint_relaxations
params.description: For zero or more groups of vehicles, specifies when and how much to relax constraints. If this field is empty, all non-empty vehicle routes are fully constrained.
